column2: §M(ED:MP)§! Invasions are disabled for all human players
§M(ED:MP)§! Invasions are NOT disabled for all human players
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' invasion permissions are managed individually
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' invasion permissions are NOT managed individually
§M(ED:MP)§! Invasions are enabled for all human players
§M(ED:MP)§! Invasions are NOT enabled for all human players
§M(ED:MP)§! The Invasion CB will be §Rdisabled§! for all human players
§M(ED:MP)§! The ability of human players to use the Invasion CB will be §Yspecified individually§!, for each player and each target kingdom
§M(ED:MP)§! The Invasion CB will be §Genabled§! for all human players
